findings.title: D1E-01: Incompatibility with Deflationary Tokens
findings.description: When transferring deflationary ERC20 tokens, the input amount may not be equal to the received amount due to the charged transaction fee.

findings.title: LAB-01 : Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: Addresses should be checked before assignment or external call to make sure they are not zero addresses.

findings.title: LCB-03 : Unsafe Cast
findings.description: In the statement `uint40(block.timestamp);`, it casts a `uint256` value to an `uint40` without evaluating its bounds.

findings.title: LCB-02 : Missing Validation
findings.description: In the `_drawReferralPayout()` function, a certain amount of token will be transferred to `referrer` as a bonus without validation to check if `bonus` is 0, resulting in unnecessary gas fees and token transfers.

findings.title: LCB-04: Lack Of self-reference Check in the `_setReferrer()`
findings.description: In function `_setReferrer()` there's no validation to check if `_referrer` could be `msg.sender` address itself. This may potentially violate the design.

findings.title: LCB-05: User Can Favor USDT and Depreciate YTG token
findings.description: The user can withdraw USDT tokens instead of YTG tokens under certain conditions, potentially depreciating YTG tokens and draining deposited USDT tokens in the LottoCore deployment.
